title: Improvement of adhesive properties of modified epoxy–novolac resin by acrylonitrile–butadiene rubber grafted poly(chromium methacrylate)
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,30378-30384
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05047A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Hyok-Sim Han, Kyong-Sik Ju, Hyon-Tae Pak, Kyun U, Yong-In Ri
The purpose of this work was to improve the adhesive properties of modified epoxy–novolac resin by acrylonitrile–butadiene rubber (NBR) grafted poly(chromium methacrylate).
